full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAM KHRID BRGYUD PA'I GSOL 'DEBS DMIGS SKOR MAN NGAG ZHAL SHES KYIS BRGYAN PA BZHUGS, ,BLO BZANG YE SHES
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (ZHES LAM KHRID BRGYUD PA'I GSOL 'DEBS DMIGS SKOR MAN NGAG ZHAL SHES KYIS BRGYAN PA 'DI NI SPONG BA PA DKA' BCU BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL GYIS NAN CHER BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS YI GER BKOD PA'O,, ,,)
